attributes.action: Do not invoke EU article 50 without full agreement by both Houses of Parliament.
attributes.background: Although the outcome of the referendum was a majority decision by those who voted, the number of people who voted for us to leave the EU, and indeed voted for us to remain was well below 50% of the registered voters and so the referendum is not representative of the UK population.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
